news from the nest

Bird 2014 Roster

Posted on 14 Jun 2014 by Tobie Miller

It was an amazing turnout at Bird's first tryouts! Thanks to all who expressed interest in our flock and participated in the tryout process. We are very excited to announce the 27 players who will be making our nest their home for the 2014 USAU Club Series:

It was an amazing turnout at Bird's first tryouts! Thanks to all who expressed interest in our flock and participated in the tryout process. We are very excited to announce the 27 players who will be making our nest their home for the 2014 USAU Club Series:

Bird 2014 Tryouts

Posted on 05 May 2014 by Andrew Kelley

Announcing Bird 2014 tryouts!

Open Tryouts:

  • Tuesday, May 27th, 6:00pm - Powderhorn Park
  • Wednesday, May 28th, 6:00pm - Powderhorn Park

Announcing Bird 2014 tryouts!

Open Tryouts:

  • Tuesday, May 27th, 6:00pm - Powderhorn Park
  • Wednesday, May 28th, 6:00pm - Powderhorn Park

Closed Tryouts:

  • Tuesday, June 3rd, 6:00pm - Oak Chase Park, Eagan
  • Wednesday, June 4th, 6:00pm - Oak Chase Park, Eagan
  • Saturday, June 7th, 2:00pm - Bryn Mawr (Southwest Corner)
  • Sunday, June 8th, 2:00pm - Bryn Mawr (Southwest Corner)

If you plan on attending any of our tryouts, please fill out the application form before they start.

Bird is Back in 2014!

Posted on 01 May 2014 by Ty Thorsen

Bird is back for the 2014 season.

After a 3rd place finish at Regionals in 2013, Bird will compete as the Top Select Flight team out of the North Central in this year's USAU Triple Crown Tour. We're looking to elevate our game and compete at an even higher level in 2014.

Bird is back for the 2014 season.

After a 3rd place finish at Regionals in 2013, Bird will compete as the Top Select Flight team out of the North Central in this year's USAU Triple Crown Tour. We're looking to elevate our game and compete at an even higher level in 2014.

This year's Bird squad will be captained by Andrew Kelley, Tobie Miller, and Dan Schmit. We have a strong core of players returning, and will be hosting tryouts for the first time this year in hopes of attracting some fresh talent to the flock.

Keep an eye out for tryout announcements coming soon.

schedule & results

At this time we have not yet finalized our tournament schedule for the year. We will likely be attending the following events:

  • Surly Invite, June 21-22, East Bethel, Minnesota
  • Minnesota Ultimate Disc Invitational, July 19-20, Maple Plain, Minnesota
  • Colorado Cup (Elite-Select Challenge), August 2-3, Aurora, Colorado
  • Chicago Heavyweight Championships, August 23-24, Rockford, Illinois
  • USAU Northwoods Sectionals, TBD, TBD
  • USAU North Central Regionals, TBD, TBD

about bird

Bird is an ultimate frisbee club from Minneapolis, Minnesota. Bird competes in the Select Flight of the USA Ultimate Mixed Club Series.

Founded in 2012, Bird brought together various groups of talented Minnesota players, many with Carleton, St. Olaf or South High School roots. In that inaugural season, Bird would compile a 20-9 record, finishing 5th at North Central Regionals. In 2013, the team would compete in its first Regional final en route to a 3rd place finish, and hold the dubious honor of being the only team to defeat eventual National Champion Drag'n Thrust in the USAU Series.

The team has high expectations coming into the 2014 season, looking to become even more competitive and raise its profile on the national level.
